abstract: Rio Tinto’s U.S. coal business submitted a new application on Wednesday for an initial public offering of up to $500 million.
snippet: Rio Tinto’s U.S. coal business submitted a new application on Wednesday for an initial public offering of up to $500 million.
lead_paragraph: Rio Tinto‘s United States coal business submitted a new application on Wednesday for an initial public offering of up to $500 million, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Rio Tinto’s U.S. Coal Miner Files for I.P.O.
